original_text: At that time, Baladan's son, Merodach-Baladan, was the king of Babylon. Merodach-Baladan sent letters and a gift to Hezekiah. He had heard the news that Hezekiah had been ill, but he was now better.
korean_text: 그 때에 발라단의 아들 바벨론 왕 므로닥발라단이 히스기야가 병 들었다가 나았다 함을 듣고 히스기야에게 글과 예물을 보낸지라

sentences.original_text: Baladan's son, Merodach-Baladan, was the king of Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 발라단의 아들 므로닥 발라단이 바빌론의 왕이었으며

sentences.original_text: Merodach-Baladan sent letters and a gift to Hezekiah
sentences.korean_translation: 므로닥 발라단은 히스기야에게 편지와 선물을 보냈고

sentences.original_text: He had heard the news that Hezekiah had been ill
